channel.title: Development on Hugo Future Imperfect

item.title: About Me | Patrick Curl | Developer
item.description: 1998 - 2007 : Geocities and Shitty Spaghetti My name is Patrick Curl, I’ve been developing websites since geocities was a thing. I’ve installed and configured tons of scripts from hotscripts over the years. For a very long time I was a script junky but never really taught myself to ‘code’. Sure, I could hack shit together and spew out spaghetti code, but really I was just good at tweaking scripts/interfaces that other’s put together and fixing broken things.
